video.title: Bordertown
video.synopsis: A gifted detective takes a job in a small town so he can spend more time with his family. But he's soon drawn into a web of disturbing murder cases.

episodes.synopsis: Seeking a simpler life, detective Kari Sorjonen and his family move to a quiet lakeside town, where he's immediately called in to solve a murder.
episodes.title: The Dolls' House (Part One)

episodes.synopsis: While Sorjonen and team inspect the new crime scene, Katia's mother searches for clues at the resort. A reporter begins digging into Sorjonen's past.
episodes.title: The Dolls' House (Part Two)

episodes.synopsis: Lena tracks down a crucial clue to the kidnapper's identity. Johanna's secrets catch up with her. Degerman reaches out to Pauliina.
episodes.title: The Dolls' House (Part Three)

episodes.synopsis: As Sorjonen investigates the suspicious death of a drug squad officer, Janina is drawn into a circle of teens planning an epic, drug-fueled party.
episodes.title: Dragonflies (Part One)

episodes.synopsis: A second death linked to the pills prompts Sorjonen to travel to St. Petersburg with a new team member. At the party, an uncomfortable scene unfolds.
episodes.title: Dragonflies (Part Two)

episodes.synopsis: The team investigates a Europol tip on a dogfighting ring, and Hannu-Pekka asks Kari for help after his date with an escort takes an alarming turn.
episodes.title: The Fury (Part One)

episodes.synopsis: Lena goes undercover at a fight club, straining her relationship with Katia. A colleague slips Sorjonen troubling information about their target.
episodes.title: The Fury (Part Two)

episodes.synopsis: A woman found alive in a fish trap at the bottom of the lake presents an unsettling new challenge for the team. A politician asks Taina for a favor.
episodes.title: The Lady in the Lake (Part One)

episodes.synopsis: Called to the scene of a deadly crash, Sorjonen tries to connect the dots between Elina and the stolen car. Pauliina moves ahead with her secret plan.
episodes.title: The Lady in the Lake (Part Two)

episodes.synopsis: Sorjonen's worlds collide when Janina wakes up spattered in blood and finds herself at the center of a murder investigation.
episodes.title: The End Game (Part One)

episodes.synopsis: Desperate to clear Janina's name, Sorjonen races to piece together fragments from different crime scenes and catch the suspected killer off guard.
episodes.title: The End Game (Part Two)

episodes.synopsis: When a mother and her son are shot dead in a car, her abusive ex seems like the obvious culprit. But Kari and Lena suspect there's more to the crime.
episodes.title: Five Finger Exercise (Part One)

episodes.synopsis: Evidence found at the second murder scene sends Lena back to Russia to confront someone from her past. Katia receives an unexpected visitor.
episodes.title: Five Finger Exercise (Part Two)

episodes.synopsis: Kari struggles to figure out what the manager of a day care center is hiding when she refuses to answer questions about a fetus found in her basement.
episodes.title: The Rite of Spring (Part One)

episodes.synopsis: With Susanna's past revealed, the case seems solved, but Kari can't shake the feeling that he's missing something. Janina makes a troubling discovery.
episodes.title: The Rite of Spring (Part Two)

episodes.synopsis: Kari takes time off to focus on Pauliina, but he's distracted by news of a sniper attack. Niko cracks under the pressure of leading his first case.
episodes.title: Cat’s Cradle (Part One)

episodes.synopsis: The third shooting leaves Janina in shock and turns the city into a ghost town. Kari redoubles his efforts to find a link between the victims.
episodes.title: Cat’s Cradle (Part Two)

episodes.synopsis: A young video blogger's grisly discovery in her new apartment spurs the team to reopen a missing-person cold case. Kari plans a party for Pauliina.
episodes.title: The Bloodmaid (Part One)

episodes.synopsis: Laura receives an anonymous delivery and realizes someone is watching her every move. Kari develops a disturbing theory about the killer.
episodes.title: The Bloodmaid (Part Two)

episodes.synopsis: When the sons of slain lawyer Seppo Laakkonen drop in on the Sorjonens at home, a plea for help soon spirals into a hostage situation.
episodes.title: Without a Shadow (Part One)

episodes.synopsis: A gunshot in the house and a body found in the woods send tensions soaring. While Kari races to connect the dots, Lena runs into trouble in Russia.
episodes.title: Without a Shadow (Part Two)

episodes.synopsis: As Kari and family wrestle with devastating news, Heikkinen calls to ask for help with a kidnapping case, and Katia stands trial for attempted murder.
episodes.title: The Human Stain

episodes.synopsis: Over Niko's objections, Kari dives into a series of grisly crimes that yield more echoes of past cases. Janina grows frustrated with her father.
episodes.title: The Human Beast 1/2

episodes.synopsis: As the team races to track down potential victims, Kari scours the country for news of the killer's daughter. A disturbing video captures a new crime.
episodes.title: The Human Beast 2/2

episodes.synopsis: When a man is murdered inside his room at a retirement home, Kari and team question his three very different sons and his much younger girlfriend.
episodes.title: Sons and Lovers 1/3

episodes.synopsis: The week's events play out from a different angle, revealing new dynamics within the family. Meanwhile, Kari grapples with his own father issues.
episodes.title: Sons and Lovers 2/3

episodes.synopsis: After another key figure in the case is found dead, Kari revisits a suspicious tragedy in the family's past. Janina interrogates Jarkko on camera.
episodes.title: Sons and Lovers 3/3

episodes.synopsis: The ritualistic murder of a young swimming instructor draws the team to a conservative religious community teeming with secrets.
episodes.title: The Lady in the Looking-Glass 1/2

episodes.synopsis: Shocking news and an unsettling encounter stoke tensions in the community. Kari leaps into action after finding Janina's diary.
episodes.title: The Lady in the Looking-Glass 2/2

episodes.synopsis: A mysterious outbreak leaves Kari locked down in a hospital ward — just as he and the team brace for the return of Lasse Maasalo.
episodes.title: Chess Story 1/2

episodes.synopsis: With the city in crisis, Anneli faces an ultimatum, and Kari must decide just how far he's willing to go to stop his nemesis.
episodes.title: Chess Story 2/2
